fpmExplorer:Page.title: Link with Quick View
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Field building block enables you to render links with quick views.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can add a QuickViewFacets annotation to an entity and point to a ReferenceFacet defining what should be shown inside the Quick View Popover.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Intent-based Navigation
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: For intent-based navigation via semantic objects, please refer to the following topic.
